name: Install Python packages via pip in Ghostty
description: Focus the Ghostty terminal input and run a pip install command to install specified Python packages.

parameters.name: pip_executable
parameters.description: The pip command to use (e.g., pip3 or pip).

parameters.name: packages
parameters.description: Space-separated list of Python packages to install (e.g., sentence-transformers faiss-cpu numpy pandas python-dotenv).
